name: Create new Google Sheets row from Airtable records when triggered by a Webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically retrieve a record from Airtable using the output of the webhook. It will validate the email from the Airtable record. If the status of the email is "valid" it will add a new row to a Google Sheet. The webhook should have a field "id" otherwise the scenario will not be triggered.
